name: OWN THE RUN SINGLET
descriptionShort: A DURABLE RUNNING TANK MADE FROM RECYCLED FABRIC.
descriptionLong: The best running layers are the ones you barely think about. This adidas tank top is designed with fast-drying, lightweight fabric to keep you comfortable while you push yourself. It's from recycled materials, part of adidas' efforts to reduce plastic waste.

name: TERREX PARLEY AGRAVIC TRAIL RUNNING SINGLET
descriptionShort: A RUNNING SINGLET FOR HOT DAYS ON THE TRAIL.
descriptionLong: Work up a sweat knowing you'll stay dry. This adidas trail running tank top features AEROREADY and open mesh fabric for moisture-wicking, breathable comfort that lets you hit your peak through hot summer conditions. The athletic fit works with you whether you're hitting your top pace or cooling down. Reflective elements enhance visibility.

name: BOSTON MARATHON SATURDAY SHORTS
descriptionShort: RUNNING SHORTS THAT HONOR THE BOSTON MARATHON.
descriptionLong: The journey from Hopkinton to Copley Square is legendary. Give it a salute as you dig into your training routine in these adidas running shorts. A Boston Marathon® logo pops from the light, stretchy fabric, and moisture-absorbing AEROREADY ensures breezy comfort over the distance. This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste.

name: AXIS NOVELTY KNIT SHORTS
descriptionShort: COMFORTABLE SHORTS FOR YOUR DAILY TRAINING SESSION.
descriptionLong: As you get your heart rate up, these adidas workout shorts keep your comfort level high. The moisture-absorbent fabric feels soft, even after you've worked up a sweat. Side pockets hold your small essentials.

name: TERREX PARLEY AGRAVIC WIND.RDY WINDBREAKER
descriptionShort: A PACKABLE WINDBREAKER JACKET FOR TRAIL RUNNING.
descriptionLong: This adidas Terrex trail running windbreaker offers one more reason to hit the trail when the weather says stay inside. WIND.RDY resists wind to keep you comfortable in windy, damp conditions. Its lightweight design stows into a pocket for easy packing. It features Parley Ocean Plastic, upcycled plastic waste intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our oceans.

name: MARATHON 3-STRIPES JACKET
descriptionShort: BOLD LINES AND THOUGHTFUL DESIGN COME TOGETHER IN THIS SPORTY JACKET.
descriptionLong: What you wear matters. This adidas running jacket is made from recycled materials, as part of our commitment to end plastic waste. Show off the bold athletic look with pride. You're making a difference.

name: OCEAN MARATHON PRIMEBLUE JACKET
descriptionShort: A COOL-WEATHER RUNNING JACKET MADE WITH THE EARTH AT HEART.
descriptionLong: Running challenges your mind and body in the best of conditions. In cold weather? Even more so. Pull on this adidas running jacket and overcome. It's padded for warmth, ventilated so you don't overheat and made with WIND.RDY to block out wind and wet. Even with all that protection? You can still move freely. Go run the earth as you do your part to protect it.This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.

name: BOSTON MARATHON OWN THE RUN REFLECTIVE WIND JACKET
descriptionShort: A HOODED WINDBREAKER MADE FOR EASY, NATURAL MOVEMENT.
descriptionLong: From Hopkinton to Heartbreak Hill, the Boston Marathon® will take everything you've got. Especially in lousy weather. Keep your spirits high through training runs and race day in this adidas running jacket. It's made with water-repellent fabric to handle gusts and showers, and reflective details that stand out in low-light situations.This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste.

name: ADIZERO PRIMEWEAVE SHORT RUNNING LEGGINGS
descriptionShort: CHEETAH-PRINT SHORTS BUILT FOR SPEED.
descriptionLong: Light in weight, heavy on speed. These adidas short leggings keep you feeling fast while running and racing. The seamless construction reduces chafing over long distances. Reflective details shine bright from dawn to dusk.

name: BOSTON MARATHON ADIZERO SHORT TIGHTS
descriptionShort: LIGHTWEIGHT SHORT TIGHTS FOR TRAINING OR RACE DAY.
descriptionLong: Some athletes dream of a stadium. Others dream of a hilly stretch in Massachusetts. These adidas running short tights will keep you feeling cool from Hopkinton to Copley Square. Using advanced lightweight fabric, adidas HEAT.RDY maximizes airflow. Slip your phone into the sweat-guard pocket, and get ready for an epic 26.2. This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.

name: SATURDAY WARM RUNNING LEGGINGS
descriptionShort: FLEECE LEGGINGS MADE FOR COOL-WEATHER RUNS.
descriptionLong: You run to win. And by win we mean, move your body, clear your mind and feel stronger with every step. In these adidas running leggings, that journey continues even when it's cold outside. Soft, stretchy fleece keeps muscles warm, and AEROREADY absorbs moisture so you stay dry. Bonus: The discreet pocket in the waistband is large enough to fit most phones.

name: EQ21 RUN SHOES
descriptionShort: SHOES FOR THE DAILY RUNNER.
descriptionLong: When running is your sport, there's nothing you love more than that daily run. Log miles in ultimate comfort when you lace up in these adidas shoes. A breathable upper keeps feet feeling cool and fresh on warm days. Lightweight cushioning makes each step more enjoyable. This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

name: ULTRABOOST 5.0 DNA SHOES
descriptionShort: ULTRABOOST SHOES MADE WITH RECYCLED MATERIALS.
descriptionLong: The best ideas? They stick around and evolve. Just look at adidas' Ultraboost running shoes. They may have started as high-performance runners, but they quickly gained a following off the track. This pair builds on their design code in a version dedicated to lifestyle wear. Running or walking, Boost cushioning delivers energy return you have to feel to believe. This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic. 50% of the upper is textile, 75% of the textile is Primeblue yarn. No virgin polyester.

name: SOLARBOOST 3 TOKYO SHOES
descriptionShort: ROAD RUNNING SHOES BUILT FOR TRAINING OR RACE DAY.
descriptionLong: Whether you're training for your first half marathon or running your fifth 26.2, these adidas running shoes provide comfort and support mile after mile. Responsive Boost cushioning, LEP and a Continental™ Stretchweb outsole work together to provide a smooth, energized ride. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

name: ADIZERO RC 3 SHOES
descriptionShort: LIGHTWEIGHT RUNNING SHOES BUILT FOR SPEED.
descriptionLong: When you're smashing past another PR or hurtling towards the finish line, you'll want to have these adidas running shoes with you. Kick it into high gear in the ultra-light build that supports your stride without weighing you down. Lightstrike cushioning has a snappy feel and the mesh upper lets your feet breathe. This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

name: SPORT SUNGLASSES SP0021
descriptionShort: ADIDAS SUNGLASSES FOR PLAY, GAME TIME AND DOWNTIME.
descriptionLong: With top performance and versatile style, these adidas sunglasses are built for any activity. Their lightweight and flexible TR-90 frame makes them comfortable and durable. Their lenses help filter UV light and enhance visual contrast. Training, competition or play, they're ready for the game and perfect for downtime after.

name: SP0007 SHINY BLACK INJECTED SPORT SUNGLASSES
descriptionShort: VENTILATED SPORT GLASSES.
descriptionLong: Work up a sweat. These adidas sport glasses have ventilation holes that help prevent moisture buildup on the lenses. While you're enjoying clear vision, you can also appreciate the snug fit and lightweight feel. Or you can just forget you're wearing them at all and get to it.

name: SPORT SUNGLASSES SP0020
descriptionShort: ADIDAS SUNGLASSES FOR PLAY, GAME TIME AND DOWNTIME.
descriptionLong: With top performance and versatile style, these adidas sunglasses are built for any activity. Their lightweight and flexible TR-90 frame makes them comfortable and durable. Their lenses help define vision in all weather and guard against eye fatigue. Training, competition or play, they're ready for the game and perfect for downtime after.

name: SP0003 SHINY BLACK INJECTED SPORT SUNGLASSES
descriptionShort: SPORT GLASSES THAT PERFORM AT YOUR LEVEL.
descriptionLong: Whatever your sport, whatever your style, your glasses shouldn't get in the way. These lightweight adidas sport glasses are flexible and snug for a second-skin kind of feel. Adjustable nose pads mean you can find the perfect fit, and ventilation holes keep the lenses clear and fog-free. So keep your eye on the prize and get after it.

name: GRIP CASE LEOPARD IPHONE 12 MINI
descriptionShort: WORKOUT WITH YOUR PHONE WITH THIS ADIDAS CASE.
descriptionLong: Safeguard your phone while you work out with this lightweight phone case. The anti-slip grip band lets you keep your phone in your hand while you run, and offers a horizontal and vertical stand function that allows you to watch workout videos more easily. A tough polycarbonate backshield and TPU bumpers offer optimal protection.

name: CLEAR GRIP CASE IPHONE 12 PRO MAX
descriptionShort: A LIGHTWEIGHT PHONE CASE FOR WORKOUT SESSIONS.
descriptionLong: Safeguard your phone while you work out with this lightweight phone case. The anti-slip grip band lets you keep your phone in your hand while you run, and offers a horizontal and vertical stand function that allows you to watch workout videos more easily. A clear polycarbonate backshield and TPU bumpers offer optimal protection.

name: UNIVERSAL ARMBAND 2.0 REFLECTIVE BLACK SIZE S
descriptionShort: A PHONE ARMBAND FOR ON THE GO.
descriptionLong: Keep your phone safe and secure while you work out with this lightweight armband. It features a stretchy knit strap with an adjustable closure and reflective elements. The seamless design allows for comfortable freedom of movement and easy access to all of your device's functions and features.

name: CLEAR GRIP CASE IPHONE 12 PRO MAX
descriptionShort: A LIGHTWEIGHT PHONE CASE FOR WORKOUT SESSIONS.
descriptionLong: Safeguard your phone while you work out with this lightweight phone case. The anti-slip grip band lets you keep your phone in your hand while you run, and offers a horizontal and vertical stand function that allows you to watch workout videos more easily. A clear polycarbonate backshield and TPU bumpers offer optimal protection.

name: FWD-01 SPORT IN-EAR HEADPHONES
descriptionShort: KEEP MOVING ALL DAY WITH THESE FRICTIONLESS, ERGONOMIC HEADPHONES.
descriptionLong: The FWD-01 offers 16 hours of wireless playtime in a sweatproof design that's optimized for your workout. Ergonomically designed earbuds use passive transparency so you can hear your surroundings. All the controls you need are on a lightweight, knitted, tangle-free cord, ensuring frictionless movement and unbeatable performance from warm-up, to workout, to recovery. Sport is constant. So are you.

name: ADIDAS RPD-01 SPORT-IN EAR EARBUDS
descriptionShort: WIRELESS EARBUDS THAT KEEP UP WITH A LIFE GROUNDED IN SPORT.
descriptionLong: Built to stay put through long days, the RPD-01 earbuds offer 12 hours of playtime in a design that keeps up with a life grounded in sport. The supportive silicone neckband stays put through city runs, weight training and morning commutes. It comes with four sizes of eartips and wings, so you find the right fit for your workout. Use the controls on the side to skip tracks and adjust the volume. Tune in and tune out, because sport is constant, and so are you.

name: RPT-01 SPORT ON-EAR HEADPHONES
descriptionShort: WIRELESS HEADPHONES BUILT TO ADAPT FROM THE GYM TO THE COMMUTE.
descriptionLong: The RPT-01 is fully equipped to meet the demands of your workout head-on. Featuring a sweatproof design with removable, washable knitted ear cushions, simple controls and uncompromising wireless sound. All you need to move seamlessly between work, the commute and your gym routine, uninterrupted. Sport is constant. So are you.

name: RUNNING BELT
descriptionShort: A STREAMLINED RUNNING BELT THAT HOLDS EVERYTHING YOU NEED.
descriptionLong: It's all about balance. This adidas running belt is roomy enough for your phone, keys and gels but sleek enough to lie flat without moving and chaffing. It's made of airy mesh with an adjustable fit for breathable comfort. When you need energy right away? The zip closure gets you to that gel at mile 20. No hassle. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: RUNNING WAIST BAG
descriptionShort: A WAIST BAG WITH A ZIP CLOSURE AND REFLECTIVE DETAILS.
descriptionLong: Some things you can't run without, but carrying them can be distracting. The answer is this adidas Running Waist Bag. The compression fit keeps the bag locked in place so your mobile, keys or wallet stay put. This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste.

name: RUNNING CITY PORTABLE BAG
descriptionShort: A COMFORTABLE RUNNING BAG FOR TAKING YOUR NECESSITIES ON THE GO.
descriptionLong: Run the city. Honor the earth. As part of adidas' commitment to help end plastic waste, this adidas bag is made with recycled materials. It rests against your body with breathable mesh and keeps everything right up front for easy access. Need a gel fast? No problem. Need to consult the map? Your phone is in there too. This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.

name: SUPERLITE HAT
descriptionShort: A LIGHTWEIGHT CAP WITH BUILT-IN UV COVERAGE.
descriptionLong: When the sun's blazing, you've got to dress accordingly. Top off your warm-weather workout ensemble with the adidas Superlite Hat. The comfortable, six-panel construction has perforated side panels to help keep you cool. A non-glare undervisor makes running on bright concrete easy on the eyes. This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste.

name: AEROREADY RETRO TECH REFLECTIVE RUNNER CAP
descriptionShort: A RETRO RUNNING CAP MADE TO KEEP YOU COOL.
descriptionLong: Shade that stands out. Reach for this adidas cap when the rays are unrelenting and you need coverage that won't weigh you down. Its curved brim shades your eyes on exposed hills, and the soft fabric with AEROREADY wicks away all that inevitable perspiration. Streaks of mesh elevate both your look and the airflow. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: 4CMTE FOUR PANEL RAIN.RDY RUNNING TRAINING CYCLING CAP
descriptionShort: A WATERPROOF CYCLING CAP TO KEEP YOUR FACE DRY.
descriptionLong: Don't let the weather ruin your routine. This adidas cycling cap blocks wind and water with RAIN.RDY. Wear it for running, racing or daily commutes. The knit sweatband keeps sweat off your face, and a reflective logo adds a bit of shine to grey days. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: RUNNING MID-CREW SOCKS
descriptionShort: LIGHTWEIGHT MID-CREW SOCKS MADE FOR COOL, DRY COMFORT.
descriptionLong: These light, stretchy mid-crew training socks are made of compressive yarns for extra support. Ventilation battles heat and moisture. And left and right orientation provides an ideal fit.

name: CUSHIONED LOW-CUT SOCKS 2 PAIRS
descriptionShort: LOW-CUT SOCKS FOR FOCUSED EFFORTS.
descriptionLong: Turn up the effort. These adidas low-cut socks support your feet with foot-hugging arch support. Lunge and move with confidence. The stretch blend absorbs moisture to keep feet feeling dry.

name: ATHLETIC CUSHIONED LOW SOCKS 6 PAIRS
descriptionShort: A SIX PACK OF SOFT, MOISTURE-WICKING SOCKS.
descriptionLong: Your muscles may complain during tough workouts, but your feet won't in these men's ankle-length training socks. The comfy cushioned socks feature sweat-wicking climalite® to help keep your feet dry. They come in a pack of six.

name: AGRAVIC PARLEY TANK TOP
descriptionShort: A SCOOP-NECK TANK TOP FOR RUNNERS.
descriptionLong: Find your flow. This adidas running tank top keeps you dry and comfortable, so you get into a nice rhythm on your run. The simple design includes details like smooth flatlock seams and moisture-wicking AEROREADY. This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.

name: ADIDAS BY STELLA MCCARTNEY TRUEPACE HEAT.RDY RUNNING CROP TOP
descriptionShort: A HIGH-PERFORMANCE CROP TOP FOR RUNNING.
descriptionLong: The adidas by Stella McCartney TruePace HEAT.RDY Running Crop Top was designed with the knowledge that there's no better incentive to workout than chic, functional gear. Crafted from stretchy, high-performance fabric designed to wick sweat away from your body, the crop top is the ideal choice for your next outdoor run or treadmill session. The 'second skin' feel provides support during training, and the high-neck racer front provides confident coverage as you put in the miles. Easily slip it on before you head out the door thanks to the elongated zip at the back. With its subtle branding, timeless minimalist design and decorative stripes, the top also looks cool enough to wear to brunch post-run.

name: OWN THE RUN CELEBRATION TEE
descriptionShort: A COOL TEE WITH ADIDAS PRIDE.
descriptionLong: Running is a celebration of what your mind and body can achieve. This t-shirt keeps you comfortable through every small triumph and defeat. An homage to adidas, it stands out with a bold pattern on the sleeve. AEROREADY wicks moisture while keeping this tee feeling soft against your skin. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: OWN THE RUN TEE
descriptionShort: A BREATHABLE RUNNING TEE MADE WITH RECYCLED MATERIALS.
descriptionLong: Life gets busy and complicated. Some days you don't feel like you have the time, or the energy, for a run. Keep things simple with this adidas Own the Run t-shirt. It's soft, comfortable and quick-drying. Plus it's made with recycled materials, part of adidas' commitment to creating a more sustainable future. So you can feel good about the shirt on your back when you lay down those miles.

name: ADIDAS X MARIMEKKO FAST TEE
descriptionShort: A RUNNING TEE MADE IN COLLABORATION WITH MARIMEKKO.
descriptionLong: Armi Ratia founded Marimekko in the '50s, and she believed a woman should be able to run in a dress if they wanted to. This adidas running t-shirt is designed with the same bold spirit that made the Finnish label ahead of its time. Wear the tee on race day, and the pattern will make it easy for your friends to find you. A loose cut gives you free movement, and AEROREADY keeps you dry.

name: ADIDAS BY STELLA MCCARTNEY TRUEPACE HEAT.RDY 3/4 RUNNING TIGHTS
descriptionShort: CROPPED, HIGH-INTENSITY TIGHTS FOR ELEVATED SUPPORT AND COMFORT.
descriptionLong: Look and feel cool while you chase your runner's high with the adidas by Stella McCartney TruePace HEAT.RDY 3/4 Running Tights—a stylish addition to any summer workout wardrobe. There's no end to high-performance features that make these tights as functional as they are aesthetically-pleasing. (Which is very, by the way). The flattering mid-rise waistband smooths and supports your core, and features a tie cord adjustment so you can find the perfect fit every time. Cut from butter-soft fabric that's designed to wick sweat away from your body, the tights will help keep you comfortable as you put in the miles. The 'second skin' feel minimizes distractions as you run, and the discreet zip pocket at the back keeps your small essentials safe and easily accessible. Team with the adidas by Stella McCartney TruePace HEAT.RDY Running Crop Top for a look that's sure to turn heads.

name: OWN THE RUN COLD.RDY RUNNING LEGGINGS
descriptionShort: INSULATED TIGHTS FOR COLD-WEATHER RUNS.
descriptionLong: Cool evenings and winter mornings are some of the best times to run. These adidas COLD.RDY running leggings make sure the low temperatures never slow you down. The soft fleece has plenty of stretch plus pre-shaped knees for easy movement. Slip your energy gels or house key into the zip pockets on the side.

name: OWN THE RUN BLOCK 7/8 RUNNING LEGGINGS
descriptionShort: CROPPED LEGGINGS MADE FOR COMFORT ON THE RUN.
descriptionLong: Count your steps, clock your time or just relax and tune into the rhythm of your stride. With comfortable fabric that fits like a second skin and moisture-wicking AEOREADY that keeps you dry, these adidas running leggings make it easy to forget the distractions and focus on your run. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: ADIDAS OWN THE RUN SOFT SHELL JACKET
descriptionShort: A REFLECTIVE RUNNING JACKET WITH VENTILATION.
descriptionLong: Your thoughts, your playlist, the sights and sounds around you. Whatever you focus on while running, this adidas jacket ensures it won't be your clothes. It offers windproof coverage and all-around reflectivity. There's also a sweat-guard pocket that's good for cash or a phone. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: TERREX PARLEY AGRAVIC TRAIL RUNNING WIND.RDY WINDBREAKER
descriptionShort: A PACKABLE WINDBREAKER JACKET FOR TRAIL RUNNING.
descriptionLong: Any day. Any weather. This adidas Terrex trail running windbreaker offers weather protection in a lightweight package. WIND.RDY resists wind to keep you comfortable in windy, damp conditions. The low-bulk design stows into a pocket for easy packing. It features Parley Ocean Plastic, upcycled plastic waste intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our oceans.

name: BELIEVE THIS MEDIUM-SUPPORT REFLECTIVE BRA
descriptionShort: A MEDIUM-SUPPORT SPORTS BRA WITH REFLECTIVE DETAILS.
descriptionLong: Put your exercise bike into hill-climbing mode and dig into your workout. This adidas AEROREADY sports bra manages moisture so you stay dry and supports you all the way. The pullover style provides medium support in the gym. Front strap stabilizers minimize bounce. Reflective details shine on your after-dinner run. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: DON'T REST ALPHASKIN BRA
descriptionShort: A MEDIUM-SUPPORT SPORTS BRA THAT STABILIZES AND SUPPORTS.
descriptionLong: Don't hesitate. Hit the gym or the trails in this adidas medium-support sports bra. Lifting, lunging, dancing or cycling, do it all with minimal bounce and ease of mind. The stretchy fabric hugs your body, so you can move freely.

name: DON'T REST ALPHASKIN BRA
descriptionShort: A MEDIUM-SUPPORT SPORTS BRA THAT STABILIZES AND SUPPORTS.
descriptionLong: Don't hesitate. Hit the gym or the trails in this adidas medium-support sports bra. Lifting, lunging, dancing or cycling, do it all with minimal bounce and ease of mind. The stretchy fabric hugs your body, so you can move freely.

name: FLUIDFLASH SHOES
descriptionShort: PLUSH KICKS INSPIRED BY INTERGALACTIC DESIGN.
descriptionLong: You never blend in. So pair your attitude with your look in these adidas Fluidflash Shoes. A graphic inspired by outer space shows through a transparent ripstop layer to level up your sneaker game. Luxe, lightweight softness makes you feel like you're walking in zero gravity. Liftoff. This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

name: CLOUDFOAM PURE 2.0 SHOES
descriptionShort: ATHLETIC SHOES WITH SUPER SOFT CLOUDFOAM CUSHIONING.
descriptionLong: Step into these shoes for crisp, clean style and comfort. Thanks to their heritage adidas vibes, these running-inspired trainers make it easy to look calm, cool and collected. Whether you're hanging out with friends or trying not to get frazzled as you tick off your weekend to-do list, stay comfortable through it all. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: FUTURENATURAL SHOES
descriptionShort: ADAPTABLE SHOES BUILT FOR THE VERSATILE ATHLETE.
descriptionLong: Trends change, but feet remain the same. Made for running and training, these adidas shoes were designed to work with the foot to support natural movement in every direction. A smooth transition between the adidas Primeknit upper and injected PU midsole provides a seamless fit and unrestricted feel. This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

name: SUPERNOVA SHOES
descriptionShort: COMFORTABLE RUNNING SHOES FOR SHORT AND LONG RUNS
descriptionLong: Take off. Touch down. Repeat. These adidas running shoes ensure soft landings and propulsive energy to help you go the distance. A combination of Boost and Bounce in the midsole provides the ideal mix of energy return and spring. The seamless build wraps around your foot, keeping it secure, ventilated and comfortable.

name: RESPONSE SUPER 2.0 SHOES
descriptionShort: VERSATILE SHOES FOR EVERYDAY WORKOUTS.
descriptionLong: From a morning run in the park to an afternoon at the gym and everything in between, crush your workouts in versatile comfort with these adidas running shoes. A snug-fitting upper gives you ankle support with a full range of motion. Responsive Boost cushioning keeps your feet always feeling ready for that next step. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

name: RUNFALCON 2.0 SHOES
descriptionShort: CASUAL ATHLETIC SHOES FOR AN ACTIVE LIFESTYLE.
descriptionLong: Put on these adidas shoes, and you're set for a run in the park followed by coffee with friends. With a mesh upper for added breathability, they're meant to deliver comfort all day long. A durable rubber outsole gives you a solid foundation no matter how busy your schedule.

name: TENNIS MATCH SKIRT
descriptionShort: A MOISTURE-ABSORBING SKIRT FOR THE TENNIS COURT.
descriptionLong: Created to give you the confidence to perform. This adidas tennis skirt will keep you comfortable on the court with moisture-absorbing AEROREADY and a wide waistband that delivers a locked-in feel. Made with soft doubleknit fabric and a slightly flared silhouette that gives you room to move, it'll ensure you stay focused on your game. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: TENNIS PRIMEBLUE TOKYO HEAT.RDY MATCH SKIRT
descriptionShort: A COOLING SKIRT FOR SPORT'S BIGGEST STAGE.
descriptionLong: As the summer sun bakes Tokyo's courts, confidence is key. That's why some of the world's top players will be relying on this adidas tennis skirt to keep them comfortable. HEAT.RDY maximizes airflow so you stay cool on the hottest days and the wide waistband delivers a snug, locked-in feel. Made with soft fabric and a slightly flared silhouette that gives you room to move, it'll ensure you stay focused no matter how big the challenge.

name: TENNIS Y-DRESS
descriptionShort: A SLIM-FITTING DRESS FOR DYNAMIC TENNIS.
descriptionLong: Created to help you own the court. The single-piece Y-shaped strap on this adidas tennis dress is precisely positioned to free your arms. Moisture-wicking AEROREADY and soft fabric that stretches with every lunge and slide combine to keep you in charge. Snug at the top, this dress flares into a flattering A-shape, while separate short tights give you full coverage. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: TENNIS PRIMEBLUE AEROKNIT MATCH SKIRT
descriptionShort: A MOISTURE-ABSORBING SKIRT THAT STARS ON COURT IN NYC.
descriptionLong: Marking the return of an icon. Showing off subtle graphics that mimic the mighty Barricade's herringbone outsole, this adidas tennis skirt makes an impression. Aeroknit absorbs moisture to keep you fresh through every point and the wide waistband delivers a snug, locked-in feel. Starring with a slightly flared silhouette, it can be seen gracing the court at North America's biggest tennis tournament.

name: TENNIS MATCH SKIRT
descriptionShort: A MOISTURE-ABSORBING SKIRT FOR THE TENNIS COURT.
descriptionLong: Created to give you the confidence to perform. This adidas tennis skirt will keep you comfortable on the court with moisture-absorbing AEROREADY and a wide waistband that delivers a locked-in feel. Made with soft doubleknit fabric and a slightly flared silhouette that gives you room to move, it'll ensure you stay focused on your game. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: TENNIS PRIMEBLUE PRINTED MATCH SKIRT
descriptionShort: A COOLING SKIRT THAT STARS ON COURT IN NYC.
descriptionLong: Celebrate the return of an icon. With a design that mimics the mighty Barricade's herringbone outsole, this adidas tennis skirt makes a real impression. HEAT.RDY keeps you cool on blazing days and the wide waistband delivers a snug, locked-in feel. Starring in soft fabric and with a slightly flared silhouette, it can be seen gracing the court at North America's biggest tennis tournament.

name: TENNIS DRESS PRIMEBLUE
descriptionShort: A COOLING DRESS THAT STARS ON COURT IN NYC.
descriptionLong: Marking the return of an icon. With a design that mimics the mighty Barricade's herringbone outsole, this adidas tennis dress makes a real impression. Its lightweight, elastic Y-back gives you space to swing while cooling HEAT.RDY keeps you fresh and confident on the warmest days. Snug at the top, the dress flares into a flattering A-shape. The built-in bra and tights add extra coverage through every slide and stretch. This eye-catching dress can be seen gracing the courts at North America's biggest tennis tournament.

name: ADIDAS BY STELLA MCCARTNEY TRUEPURPOSE HIGH INTENSITY SHORTS
descriptionShort: TWO-IN-ONE TRAINING SHORTS FOR HIGH-INTENSITY SESSIONS.
descriptionLong: You show up for a reason. Whatever that might be, honor yourself and give it your all. These adidas by Stella McCartney shorts support high-intensity training sessions, encouraging you to completely unleash. Moisture-absorbing fabric keeps you dry and comfortable as you do. No need to think about coverage. You're set with the high waist and built-in tights. The only thing you're revealing is your determination.

name: ADICOLOR CLASSICS RIPSTOP SHORTS
descriptionShort: WARM-WEATHER SHORTS WITH CLASSIC ADIDAS STYLE.
descriptionLong: You've seen them on the track, the field and the tennis court. The 3-Stripes have been hanging out on sunny days for decades. Wear them on these adidas shorts and enjoy lightweight, breezy fabric as you make your own sunny-weather moves. No athleticism required. Park walks and ice cream? That's more like it. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: TERREX PRIMEBLUE TRAIL RUNNING SHORTS
descriptionShort: LIGHTWEIGHT TRAIL RUNNING SHORTS FOR AN UNRESTRICTED FEEL.
descriptionLong: Lace up your shoes and leave distraction behind in these adidas trail running shorts. These everyday training shorts are lightweight and minimalist by design so you can focus on the terrain ahead. A zip pocket secures essentials for safe keeping. Recycled materials are a step towards ending plastic waste.

name: MARATHON 20 SHORTS
descriptionShort: BREATHABLE RUNNING SHORTS MADE TO GO THE DISTANCE.
descriptionLong: Meet the workhorse of workout wear. Soft and breathable, these adidas running shorts are sporty and super comfortable. AEROREADY helps keep moisture off your skin and your mind on your run. Now you're ready for anything.
